price: “Pozovite božanstva vaša!”, reći će im se, pa će ih oni pozivati, ali im se ona neće odazvati, i patnju će doživjeti. Ah, da su na Pravom putu bili!
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqīla id'ʿū shurakāakum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wara-awū al-ʿadhāba law annahum kānū yahtadūna
